SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.server

Class GlobalLobby

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.GlobalLobby
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class GlobalLobby extends Object implements Serializable
Class that represents the Global Lobby of the server that contains all the games in progress or waiting to be created and the players that have just successfully connected (with unique username) and have not yet decided what to do. The player can create a new game, join a game with a specific id (known by the client himself), join the first free spot in a random game or quit the server for when he doesn't want to play any other game in this server application. The server can also reconnect a player to a game lobby if the player has disconnected from the server but not from the game, and the game is still in progress. if so, the server will reconnect the player to the game lobby and the game will continue from where it is, it won't ask but is automatically reconnected to the game lobby when the player reconnects to the server with the same username.
See Also:

    addPlayerToWaiting(String nickname, Connection connection, boolean afterEndGame)
    Method that adds a player to the waiting list of the global lobby of the server and asks him what he wants to do next (create a new game, join a game with a specific id, join the first free spot in a random game or quit the server) if the game is not in progress or waiting to be created, otherwise it will add the player to the game lobby and the game will continue from where it is
    void
    disconnectPlayerFromGlobalLobby(String nickname)
    Method that disconnects a player from the global lobby, removing him from the waitingPlayersWithNoGame map or from the game lobby he was in
    void
    endGameLobbyFromGlobalLobby(int gameId)
    Method that ends a game lobby, removing it from the global lobby and moving all the players in the waiting list of the global lobby where they can decide what to do next or quit the game application

    • addPlayerToWaiting

      public void addPlayerToWaiting(String nickname, Connection connection, boolean afterEndGame) throws IOException
      Method that adds a player to the waiting list of the global lobby of the server and asks him what he wants to do next (create a new game, join a game with a specific id, join the first free spot in a random game or quit the server) if the game is not in progress or waiting to be created, otherwise it will add the player to the game lobby and the game will continue from where it is
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player that wants to be added to the waiting list of the global lobby of the server
      connection - the connection of the player that wants to be added to the waiting list of the global lobby of the server
      Throws:
      IOException - if there are problems with the connection
